I wanted to purchase the game today for my family.

If I buy a copy online, is that copy allowed to be used on multiple computers, or is the copy only allowed on 1 computer. Myself and my 2 oldest kids want to play and I was just wondering how that worked.

If I need to buy 3 copies, could I at a later date purchase those and would they be able to play on my account, or would I need to create 3 different accounts?
You are allowed to install copies to every computer you own and you can make any number of copies for yourself.

> 
> Awesome! Thank You!!!

Just make sure not to give copies out to *everyone* you know. Happy flying! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
